General.Name: Genius Electronic Optical Co Ltd
General.Description: Genius Electronic Optical Co., Ltd, an optical technology company, designs, develops, and sells lenses in Taiwan. It offers mobile lenses; and VR/AR and automotive optics. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 1, Keya East Road, Taichung, Taiwan, 428
